<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skim Scroll](/Feats.aspx?ID=6402) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 213 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Scroll Trickster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=262)

**Prerequisites**
[Scroll Trickster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6400)

</column>

---

You can activate the magic of a [scroll](/Equipment.aspx?Category=52) with a cursory read as you draw it from your belt. You Interact to draw a scroll, then use [Trick Magic Item](/Feats.aspx?ID=5229) on the scroll.
name: Skim Scroll
